name: Leonin
description: Leonin are proud, leonine humanoids from the plains of Oreskos. They are known for their bravery, strength, and strong sense of honor. Leonin tribes value self-sufficiency and often live in close-knit communities. They possess a strong bond with nature and a fierce protective instinct, especially towards their own kind.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Leonin.
special: Daunting Roar: As a bonus action, you can let out an intimidating roar. Creatures of your choice within 10 feet that can hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier) or become frightened until the end of your next turn.
